entries.meaning: A male police officer, sometimes used for any police officer regardless of gender.
examples: The policeman who arrests the "Red" does not understand the theories the "Red" is preaching; if he did, his own position as bodyguard of the monied class might seem less pleasant to him.

entries.meaning: (chemistry) A glass rod capped at one end with rubber, used in a chemistry laboratory for gravimetric analysis.
(entomology) Any skipper of the genus Coeliades.

examples: A team may have a policeman or enforcer.
